name: Sneordin
domains: God of Ice, Snow, and Winter
worshippers: Yetis, Ice Mephits, those in cold climates often make offerings to request a gentle winter
weapon: A scepter made of an icicle
appearance: Sneordin's nose is an icicle, his beard wisps of snow. His towering form dressed in all white with clawed hands reminiscent of the bare branches of a tree in winter.
tenets: Your desires are the enemy of your goals
A coldly logical mind is your best tool
Snow and ice can both protect and destroy, when used correctly
holiday: The Snow Celebration, typically held on Neradan 20 in the northern hemisphere.
parents: 3rd Generation, born of Trimala and Area
lore: The followers of Sneordin have a unique method of divining, reading messages from Sneordin in the patterns frost makes on things such as glass or the surfaces of ponds. Priests of Sneordin typically take a vow of chastity, puting aside their earthly desires.
